attributes.action: let Al Bangura of Watford Football Club stay in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the sad news regarding Al's latest appeal we ask the PM to allow this honest, talented TAX PAYING young man to continue building his life in the UK. As a note i am not in any way affilated with Watford FC.

rejection.details: Individual cases are a matter for direct correspondence with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
